description: A cpClientAuthenticationFailure trap signifies that the SNMP entity,
acting in an agent role, has detected a client authentication failure.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpClientAuthenticationFailure FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientMacAddress s EXAMPL FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientCPID i 9999 FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientAssocIfIndex i 9999 FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientSwitchMacAddress s EXAMPL FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientUserName s EXAMPLE FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientAuthFailureConnectionAttempts i 9999

description: The MAC address of the workstation from which the client is authenticated.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientMacAddress

description: The IP address of the workstation from which the client is authenticated.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientIpAddress

description: The captive portal instance on which the client was authenticated.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientCPID

description: The interface on which the client was authenticated.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientAssocIfIndex

description: The MAC address of the switch to which the client is authenticated.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientSwitchMacAddress

description: User name (or Guest ID) of the connected client.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientUserName

description: The captive portal authentication failure count.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientAuthFailureConnectionAttempts

description: A cpClientConnect trap signifies that the SNMP entity,
acting in an agent role, has detected a client connection.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpClientConnect FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientMacAddress s EXAMPL FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientAssocIfIndex i 9999 FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientCPID i 9999 FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientSwitchMacAddress s EXAMPL

description: The MAC address of the workstation from which the client is authenticated.

description: The IP address of the workstation from which the client is authenticated.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientIpAddress

description: The captive portal instance on which the client was authenticated.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientCPID

description: The MAC address of the switch to which the client is authenticated.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientSwitchMacAddress

description: A cpClientDatabaseFull trap signifies that the SNMP entity,
acting in an agent role, has detected that client authentication database is full.
The MAC address of the workstation from which the client is authenticated.
variables.name: FASTPATH-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientMacAddress

description: A cpClientDisconnect trap signifies that the SNMP entity,
acting in an agent role, has detected a client disconnection.
